authentication.loginDescription: Write your email and password to access your account.
authentication.registerDescription: Enter the following information to create an account.
authentication.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 6 characters long
authentication.nameMinLength: Name must be at least 2 characters long

accounts.idMaxLength: ID must be 50 characters or less
accounts.nameMaxLength: Name must be 100 characters or less
accounts.initialValueMin: Initial value must be zero or greater
accounts.initialValueDecimal: Initial value must have at most 2 decimal places
accounts.noParentAccountsAvailable: No parent accounts available. Create a regular account first.
accounts.createAccountDescription: Accounts will help ledgers be more organized
accounts.accountCreateError: There was an error creating the account
accounts.noAccountsDescription: Create your first account to start organizing your finances.
accounts.editAccountDescription: Update the account name or type.
accounts.deleteAccountConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this account? This action cannot be undone.
accounts.deleteAccountWillDeleteChildren: This action will also delete all subaccounts associated with this account.
accounts.addValueDescription: Enter the amount to add to this account.
accounts.valueMin: Amount must be greater than zero
accounts.addValueActiveHint: This is an active account. The amount will be added to the balance.
accounts.addValuePassiveHint: This is a passive account. The amount will be subtracted from the balance.
accounts.accountUpdateError: There was an error updating the account
accounts.accountDeleteError: There was an error deleting the account
accounts.valueAddError: There was an error adding value to the account
accounts.idCannotBeChanged: Account ID cannot be changed after creation.
accounts.parentIdCannotBeChanged: Parent account relationship cannot be changed after creation.
accounts.accountsDescription: Manage your accounts and track balances

companies.companiesDescription: Manage your companies and switch between them
companies.createCompanyDescription: Ledgers and accounts are created under a company. You can create multiple companies and switch between them.
companies.editCompanyDescription: You can edit the company name and description.
companies.deleteCompanyConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this company?
companies.companyNameMaxLength: Company name must be at most 50 characters long
companies.deleteCompanyWarning: WARNING: Deleting a company is a destructive action that will permanently remove all associated data including accounts, entries, and ledgers due to foreign key constraints. This action cannot be undone.
companies.deleteCompanyConfirmationInput: To confirm deletion, type the exact company name below:
companies.createCompanyToGetStarted: Create a company to get started

entries.entriesDescription: Manage your accounting entries and transactions
entries.deleteEntryConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this entry? This action cannot be undone.
entries.noAccountsAvailable: No accounts available. Create an account first.
entries.memoMaxLength: Memo must be 200 characters or less
entries.debitMustBePositive: Debit must be zero or greater
entries.creditMustBePositive: Credit must be zero or greater
entries.debitOrCreditRequired: Either debit or credit must be greater than zero (but not both)
entries.entryCreateError: There was an error creating the entry
entries.entryUpdateError: There was an error updating the entry
entries.entryDeleteError: There was an error deleting the entry
entries.noEntriesDescription: Create your first entry to start tracking transactions.

tooltips.requiresCompany: Please select or create a company first
tooltips.requiresAccounts: Please create accounts for this company first
